mid.title: USER
mid.passwordRequirement: The password must contain uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers (0-9) and special characters (exclusively [-.,;:%#@=\"+&()!*/]).
mid.managingDirectorDescription: If your organization does not have a managing director, please enter the name of the person primarily responsible for your organization here.
mid.legalNameHelp: (You can find the legal name of your company in the commercial register extract)
mid.organizationInfoDescription: This data represents your company. All fields are optional, but those marked with MID are required to participate in the MID lottery.
mid.organizationCreationDescription: Set up your organization account. Fields marked with * are required to get started. You can add more details later for MID applications.
mid.quickSetupDescription: You can optionally enter your organization's Impressum URL here and click the button so our form tries to fill some fields automatically based on the public information in your Impressum. It only takes 1 second. You can of course edit any field afterwards.
mid.midContactDescription: The person in your organisation who is the contact person for MID projects for RapidWorks and the funding agency. Unless someone else is specified, the managing director listed is also the MID contact person.
mid.managingDirectorIsMidContact: Managing Director is also MID contact
mid.midContactOptions.same: Managing Director is also MID contact
mid.midContactOptions.different: MID contact person differs from managing director
mid.projectContactHelp: Please enter the technical contact person here.
mid.companyDescription: Brief description of the applying company.
mid.descriptionPlaceholder: Creation of brand appearances for companies and other services.
mid.bankAccountDescription: Is required by MID for the lottery ticket submission.
mid.taxIdHelp: You can find your organization's tax number (In Germany \"Steuernummer\") on a letter from the tax office, in Elster, or on your business registration, for example.
mid.bankName: Name of the Bank of the Business Account
mid.companyTypeOptions.association: Association of natural and/or legal persons
mid.companyCategory: Company category according to SME definition
mid.companyCategoryOptions.micro: Micro enterprise: Annual turnover & balance sheet total < 2 Mio. €.
mid.companyCategoryOptions.small: Small enterprise: Annual turnover & balance sheet total < 10 Mio. €.
mid.companyCategoryOptions.medium: Medium enterprise: Annual turnover < 50 Mio. € & balance sheet total < 43 Mio. €.
mid.companyCategoryOptions.large: Large enterprise: Annual turnover >= 50 Mio. € or balance sheet total > 43 Mio. €.
mid.industryOptions.media: Media and Creative Industries (Architecture, Design, Literature, Press, Software/Games, Fine Arts, Film, Music, Broadcasting, Theater, Dance, Culture)
mid.industryOptions.manufacturing: Other Manufacturing (Food and Feed Production; Beverages; Textiles; Wood; Paper; Chemical and Pharmaceutical Products; Furniture etc.)
mid.industryOptions.energy: Energy and Environmental Economy (including water supply)
mid.industryOptions.professional: Provision of Professional Scientific Technical Services (e.g. Legal and Tax Consulting, Business Consulting, Architecture Offices, Photography etc.)
mid.employeesHelp: Some subsidy programs use the total number of employees, others use full-time equivalents. If you don't know the exact figures off the top of your head, rough estimates will suffice. However, the thresholds for subsidies are 10, 50, and 250 employees. So it is only important that your number is in the correct range (0-9, 10-49, 50-249, 250+). Within this range, it can be inaccurate (e.g., 25 instead of 29 is okay, but 10 instead of 9 is a relevant difference).
mid.totalEmployeesHelp: Count every social secured employee as one complete employee, indifferent of worked hours
mid.fullTimeEquivalentsHelp: Counting based on weekly hours (e.g., 0.5 for half-time employee)
mid.employees: Number of employees including partner and affiliated companies (Full-time equivalents)
mid.midFundingInfo: Important: Companies must wait 24 months between MID funding approvals. Please provide details about any previous MID Digitisation or Digital Security funding received.
mid.hasReceivedDigitisation: Has your company previously received MID Digitisation funding?
mid.hasReceivedDigitalSecurity: Has your company previously received MID Digital Security funding?
mid.selectYesNo: Please select Yes or No for MID funding received in the past
mid.lastDigitisationApproval: Date of Last MID Digitisation Approval
mid.lastDigitalSecurityApproval: Date of Last MID Digital Security Approval
mid.cooldownExplanation: The 24-month cooldown period begins from this approval date
mid.emailForwardingDescription: Please set up email forwarding from MID systems to subsidy@rapid-works.io.
mid.supportOffer: We offer free technical support for the setup.
mid.digitalSignatureText: I confirm with my digital signature that all information is correct and complete.
mid.errorMessage: Error submitting form. Please try again.
mid.applyModalIntro: Listed here are your organization details that we will use for your official MID registration. Please carefully verify that these are correct. We assume no liability for incorrect information.
mid.applyPrivacyAgreement: and accept it and agree to the processing of my data for the MID application.
mid.applyDigitalSignatureConfirmation: I confirm that all information in this MID application is true and correct to the best of my knowledge.
mid.applyDigitalSignatureTermsAgreement: and mandate RapidWorks to use my data to register and apply for the MID Digitalisation Voucher NRW on my behalf.
mid.applyExistingApplicationText: You already have a MID application. If you submit again, it will update your existing application with any changes you've made.
mid.applyMissingInfoText: Please complete all MID-required fields in your company information before applying. The following fields are missing:
mid.applyPrivacyRequired: Please accept the privacy policy to proceed.
mid.applySignatureRequired: Please accept the digital signature to proceed.
mid.applyTermsRequired: Please accept the terms and conditions to proceed.
mid.applySubmitError: Failed to submit MID application. Please try again.
mid.applyNotInNRW: The postal code is not in North Rhine-Westphalia. MID funding is only available for companies in NRW.
profile.title: Your Profile
profile.addProfilePicture: Click on the camera icon to add a profile picture.
profile.deleteAccountWarning: Please note that if you delete your account, all your data will be irrevocably deleted!
profile.contactSupport: Contact our support to change your email address.
organization.confirmRemoveMember: Are you sure you want to remove this member from the organization?

organization.pleaseEnterEmail: Please enter at least one valid email address.
organization.organizationLimitMessage: You can currently create only one organization. However, you can still be invited to and join multiple organizations.
organization.organizationLimitInfo: Good news: You can still be a member of unlimited organizations when others invite you!
organization.errorCreateFailed: Failed to create organization. Please try again.
organization.errorCheckingStatus: Failed to check organization creation status
auth.accountNeededTaskSubtitle: In order to make fixed price requests you first need to create a RapidWorks account so that we can reach you back.
auth.accountNeededBrandingSubtitle: In order to request Rapid Branding you first need to create a RapidWorks account so that we can reach you back.
auth.accessDashboard: Access your RapidWorks dashboard and services
auth.createAccountTask: Create your RapidWorks account to request fixed price tasks from our experts.
auth.createAccountBranding: Create your RapidWorks account to request Rapid Branding services.
auth.joinRapidWorks: Join RapidWorks to access our services.
auth.passwordRequirement: Password must be at least 6 characters long
auth.checkEmailMessage: Please check your email for a verification link to activate your account.
auth.emailNotVerified: Your account is not verified. Please check your email for a verification link and click it to activate your account.
auth.emailNotVerifiedLogin: Please verify your email address before signing in. Check your inbox for a verification link.
branding.noKitsYet: You don't have any kits yet.
branding.createNewKits: or create new ones to get started!
branding.listNewKitSubtitle: Add metadata for an existing branding kit
branding.kitNameWarning: Important: This kit name must match exactly with the ID used in the code. The assets are already coded - this only controls access and status.
branding.organizationNameHelp: If specified, this kit will only be visible to members of this organization
branding.authorizedEmailsHelp: Comma-separated list of emails that can access this kit
branding.paidLabel: Paid - Kit has been paid for
branding.readyLabel: Ready - Kit is ready for download
branding.errorKitNameRequired: Kit name is required and will be used as the document ID
branding.kitNameReadonlyNote: Note: Kit name cannot be changed as it's used as the Firebase document ID.
task.title: Describe your Task
task.description1: Describe the task (In German or English).
task.description2: will then directly review it and make sure everything is understood perfectly. He might reach out to you via push notification to make sure the task is understood correct. Once all is clear
task.description3: will make a work time estimate and send you a fixed price offer. You can then accept or reject this offer. When accepted
task.description4: will fulfill the task and send you the result once finished. Regardless of how long
task.description5: took, we will charge you the agreed fixed price in the next monthly invoice.
task.taskDescriptionPlaceholder: Please provide detailed requirements, specifications, and any specific needs...
task.taskDescriptionHelp: The more details you provide, the more accurate the estimate will be.
task.filesUploadText: Click to upload files or drag and drop
task.filesAccepted: PDF, DOC, Images, ZIP, TXT, CSV files up to 10MB each
task.filesUploadingWait: Please wait while your files are being uploaded
task.successMessage: Your task has been sent to our expert for review.
task.successSubtext: You'll receive push notifications when the expert responds with questions or an estimate.
task.errorRequired: Please fill in all required fields
task.errorLogin: You must be logged in to submit a task request.
task.errorLoginFiles: You must be logged in to upload files.
task.errorFileSize: File size must be less than 10MB
task.errorSubmitFailed: Failed to submit request. Please try again.
task.errorUploadFailed: Failed to upload files. Please try again.
task.noOrganizationMessage: You need to be part of an organization to create tasks. Please create an organization first.
